name: Guiding Light (itch)
description:
As you are trapped in this spider infested world, you must escape. You are your own light source and it is your job to navigate through the darkness and find your way out. You must sneak past the horde of spiders unknown, but be careful, you attract more spiders as you emit more light.

The controls are simple: Click and hold to move, Spacebar to open map

This game was created in 72hrs for the Dev Squad Game Jam. The theme of the jam was Darkness and the objects used were Map and Fire.

People Involved: Tyranosaw (https://twitter.com/Tyranosaw), Zuezazon (https://twitter.com/Zuezazon) and Fynzyme AKA Sodagen (https://soundcloud.com/sodagen).
